name: Starter Bakery
description:
Cat? Dog? Interdimentional Fuzzball? Bakers dont' have time for pets like this - especially when establishing their first bakery!

Their only real pet is and always will be their sourdough starter

Give it a name, care for it, and use it to make loads of cash!

Game Help:

Use Arrow Keys to move between your Starter, Your Bread Inventory, and The Shop

Buy flour and feed it to your starter. Then use it to bake bread

Try and keep the starter healthy so the bread is high quality. Its expression might help you out here

Sleep to let the starter work, and restock the shops, and update prices
